ValidationRule.description: You can only create an Event if the duration of the Action is 14 days or less.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(amc__Action_Duration__c > 14, OR( AND(ISCHANGED(amc__Event__c), amc__Event__c == true), AND( ISNEW(), amc__Event__c == true)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Event cannot be created due to your Action Duration being greater than 14 days.
